content.rendered:
Bouffant cap is made of 14 14 gsm polypropylene Spunbond Nonwoven fabric to give excellent protection and professional look to the user.
It’s ideal for medical, and industrial applications, where basic head cover is requirement. Also it can be used in food and electronic processing factories.

Specification
14 gsm, Polypropylene Spunbond Nonwonve fabric
21 or 24 Inch. or customers preference, snap opening and covers most hair styles
Firmly done with sewing machine maintain higiene importance
Elastic opening
Secure fit and effective hair drop/lint protection

Available
White, Blue, Green colour as requested
Any pattern with up to three colours

Packing
100 pcs per poly bag
10 poly bags per carton (1000pcs)
